scripts.build:static: rm -r ./dist/; mkdir dist; cp -r assets dist/; cp index.html dist/index.html; cp node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js dist/core-js.min.js; cp node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.min.js dist/zone.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:static; yarn run build:styles; ngc -p tsconfig-aot.json; NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup-vendor.config.js; NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build:jit: yarn run build:static; yarn run build:styles; NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup-vendor.config.js; NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup-jit.config.js
scripts.compile: yarn run build:static; rollup -c rollup-vendor.config.js; rollup --watch -c rollup.config.js
